    • Method Detail

      • SHARE_FILE_INTERNAL_USER_VIA_TOOLBAR_TC

        public void SHARE_FILE_INTERNAL_USER_VIA_TOOLBAR_TC()
        Summary
        Share File with Internal User via Toolbar
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select file
        3. Click on Share button
        4. Add Shared UserName
        5. Verify the Activity log
        6. Login with Internal user
        7. Browse Shared URL
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify File should be previewed

      • SHARE_FILE_INTERNAL_USER_VIA_CONTEXT_MENU_TC

        public void SHARE_FILE_INTERNAL_USER_VIA_CONTEXT_MENU_TC()
        Summary
        Share File with Internal user via Context menu
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select file
        3. Right Click on file
        4. Click on Share button
        5. Add Shared UserName
        6. Verify the Activity log
        7. Login with Internal user
        8. Browse Shared URL
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify File should be previewed

      • MOVE_SHARE_FILE_AND_ACCESS_SHARED_FILE_TC

        public void MOVE_SHARE_FILE_AND_ACCESS_SHARED_FILE_TC()
        Summary
        Move Share file and Access the same file from shared user
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select file
        3. Right Click on file
        4. Click on Share button
        5. Add Shared UserName
        6. Move shared file to another location
        7. Login with External user
        8. Browse Shared URL
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify File should be previewed

      • REMOVE_SHARE_FILE_ACCESS_TC

        public void REMOVE_SHARE_FILE_ACCESS_TC()
        Summary
        Remove Share file access and try to access it from shared user
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        File should be already shared with another user
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select file
        3. Right Click on file
        4. Click on Share button
        5. Remove link
        6. Remove user
        7. Login with External user
        8. Browse Shared URL
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify File should not be previewed

      • DOWNLOAD_SHARE_FILE_INTERNAL_USER_TC

        public void DOWNLOAD_SHARE_FILE_INTERNAL_USER_TC()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Summary
        Download Share File with Internal User
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select file
        3. Click on Share button
        4. Add Shared Internal UserName with Download permission
        5. Login with Internal user
        6. Browse Shared URL
        7. Click on Download button to Download the file
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify File should be Downloaded
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown when file not found in directory

        Throws:

      • DELETE_FILES_FOLDER_CREATED

        public void DELETE_FILES_FOLDER_CREATED()
        Summary
        Delete extra folders created during all the test cases of Share file
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Select folder
        2. Click on delete button in ToolBar
        3. Click on OK button
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify folders which were created during all the Share file test cases should not be present to root location
